data.title: LITTLE HOUSE ON THE PRAIRIE COUPLE: CHARLES AND CAROLINE INGALLS
data.meta_description: LIttle House on the Prairie couple- Charles and Caroline Ingalls one of my favorite couples on the show bar none is Charles and Caroline Ingalls(ma & pa) they are so adorable together!they seemed as though they were no nonsense parents and when the girls got out of line they got a stern lecture and there…
data.text:
one of my favorite couples on the show bar none is Charles and Caroline Ingalls(ma & pa) they are so adorable together!they seemed as though they were no nonsense parents and when the girls got out of line they got a stern lecture and there were consequences–

even when laura got into that fight in front of the restaurant in her late teens(she was married to almanzo at that point too) Ma helped to break up the fight and when laura was trying to say what she would have done had it not been broken up– ma exclaimed very sternly “you will be silent!!”

Ma was also the voice of reason when laura and almanzo squabbled or when pa didn’t like the idea of laura and almanzo being together.Ma also had a strong dislike for mrs oleson(who in walnut grove didn’t? LOL!)Pa was a typical farmer that loved his family and he too didn’t care for Nellie and her mother, but always tried to do the right thing–

there was even an episode where he tried to find a home (or homes) for a widows children after she passed away and had to make a decision that he didn’t want to when it involved keeping the widows kids together.

i also love the episode where pa reinacted his proposal to caroline and they renewed their vows– the dress she wore(it belonged to a friend) was gorgeous.
